text:
Really love the new GraphQL option. It be amazing to have the option to go full Jamstack using HubSpot. There are probably way's to kind of get it to work as things are, but I'm imagining something like <https://prismic.io> x <https://www.slicemachine.dev> x Jamstack.

So like an upgraded HubSpot templates and modules setup that can be pulled into NextJS.

Cool idea, interested in chatting more about this over a Zoom? Would love to hear about what you are using GraphQL for and your expectations as it relates to Jamstack/JavaScript for building websites on the CMS.

Wondering if there are any plans to add a page editing experience to system templates (much like the new editing experience for blog listing templates)? Would be great not to have to direct users to the design manager to edit global partials for error, search, etc.

Also, just realized that the design manager global content editor is inaccessible from marketplace themes unless the theme is cloned so there's legit currently no way for users to easily edit system pages. :/
a range field would be stellar
